title: PVB Violation Details
description: Schema for validating the details of a manually entered PVB violation.

plate.description: The license plate number of the vehicle.

state.description: The state of the license plate (e.g., 'NY', 'NJ', 'CT').

type.description: The type code of the violation (e.g., 'OMT' for Overtime Parking, 'PAS' for No Parking).

summons.description: The unique summons/ticket number from the violation.

issue_date.description: The date the violation was issued (ISO format: YYYY-MM-DD).

issue_time.description: The time the violation was issued in HHMM(A/P) format (e.g., '0550P', '1130A'). Optional field.

fine.description: The base fine amount of the violation.

reduction.description: Any reduction applied to the amount due.
